attributes.action: We want the Asset Community Value ( A. C. V.) bill to be made law in Wales.
attributes.background: We want to save OUR village pub, the Cross Foxes, Garndolbenmaen from change of use. We, the villagers, want to buy it as a Community asset. Please sign and share Caroll Ann Morris's petition on behalf of the villagers. We lost our shop and our post office two years ago without notice.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for.  You can find out more here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN06366


The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
